resources.string: To participate in the evaluation of the competition, you have to go to a participating bakery and make a purchase.When paying, you will receive a ticket delivered with a unique code to enter in the application before you can vote .You rate the bakery out of three criteria: reception, presentation of the store and the quality of the products. For each criterion, you assign a score from 1 to 5. The total score of the bakery will be the sum of the three evaluations. Before the end of the evaluation period, you must have sent at least 5 evaluations. Make sure you follow this rule so that your vote is taken into account.Import bakeries for start noting!
